scripts.build:a: cd ./production-mock && pnpm run build && cd ../development-mock && pnpm run build
scripts.build:b: cd ./development-mock && pnpm run build && cd ../production-mock && pnpm run build
scripts.install:pnpm: cd ./development-mock && pnpm i && cd ../production-mock && pnpm i
scripts.install:npm: cd ./development-mock && npm i && cd ../production-mock && npm i
